<role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) { var targetType = !current.measure.choice_set && current.type != 'milestone'?'quantitative':'qualitative'; if(!new TargetProgressUtil(current).logTargetProgress(targetType)){ var targetLabel = sn_gf.GFUtil.getTableLabel(GoalFrameworkConstants.GOAL_TARGET_TABLE).toLowerCase(); gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage("Could not create {0} progress record.", GlideStringUtil.escapeHTML(targetLabel))); } })(current, previous);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2021-06-30 12:17:27</sys_created_on>
